To Kamo-san
Mazuwa nanigotomo nakute yokatta desu.
Tomodachi no shinpai wo shitekurete arigatougozaimashita.
Okagesama de zen-in buji deshita.


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Serizawa Kamo <serizawakamo@y...> wrote:

>Unfortunately, not yet. Hadn't had the time (and
>money!) to do so T_T

>I have seen several Shinsengumi mangas, but none got
>really my attention.

Before half a year, many bookstores had a Shinsengumi corner. 
(It is the influence of Taiga drama.) 
Although the time was easy to look for Shinsengumi-Mangas, it has 
finished. 
The bookstore is preparing the following Taiga drama (Minamoto no 
Yoshitsune) books. 
Kanashii....

I think that Shinsengumi-Manga is a genre very difficult for 
creators. 
Many Manga readers are not interested in the difficult situation of 
Bakumatsu. 
Or there is no feature in the work and readers may get bored. 
Most Shinsengumi-Mangas stops the series for reasons of non-
popularity. 


>"PAPUWA" wa kiita koto ga arimasuga, yonda koto ga
>arimasen ^^;;; "Gintama" wa Jump dakara shitte imasu.
>Demo yonde imasen ^^;;; Shinsengumi-ppoi chara ga deru
>koto wa shitte imasu ga, sore dake desu. ^^;;;
>(demo Shinsengumi kara deta chara nante Yamato datte
>aru shi ne ^^;;;)

"PAPUWA" and "Gintama" are jokes^^;;;
Demo sitteiru kara kowai....

Furthermore, you know to Shinsengumi-material of Yamato. 
Uchusenkan-Yamato(Space Battleship Yamato / Star Blazers)
Why does Kamo-san know it? I was panicked. 
It is famous to Japanese Shinsengumi fans.
However, I did not think at all that the foreign Shinsengumi fan 
knew it. 
In order to notice it, you need to know the Japanese name of the 
captains of Yamato. 
Furthermore, you need to be a Shinsengumi fan. 
I think that this is miraculous probability. 

Omisoreitashimashita....^^;;; 


Although there is almost no Shinsengumi Anime, a parody is seen 
occasionally^^;;;
Incidentally, does Kamo-san know this Anime? 

http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%8A%80%E6%B2%B3%E7%83%88%E9%A2%A8%E3%
83%90%E3%82%AF%E3%82%B7%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AC%E3%83%BC

http://www.imagica.com/shop/j9/bax_s.html

Korerano setsumei wo mite watashi wa bakusyou shimashita.
Tokuni tekigata no namae ga sugoi desu.




>Not that much. It's interesting how the author
>portrayed Serizawa-Hijikata interaction, but the art
>is below average and the story isn't that appealing,
>not to mention that they don't use the famous
>Shinsengumi uniform ^^;;;

>It really seems that it was ended because of
>"uchikiri".

"uchikiri"...yahari sore ka.
There are many works stopped by the halfway story. 
There is almost no Shinsengumi-Manga which continued to Hakodate. 
Many Mangas were announced by the influence of a Taiga drama this 
year.
However, the most is a short story. 
 

>That's true enough. Kondou tends to play rather a
>secondary role in most manga.

I think that this is the influence of "Moeyo Ken". 
The novels of Shiba Ryotarou give gifted character to the main 
character, and there is a tendency to set up people around it 
foolish. 
Kondo Isami and Ootori Keisuke received this damage by "Moeyo Ken". 
The present Shinsengumi works have followed a setup of "Moeyo Ken" 
mostly. 


>o.o I haven't seen the 5th volume yet... I have to
>search for this...

I'm sorry, I made misunderstanding to you. 
Sale of vol.5 is on December 3. 
Since I am reading YS, I know the contents of vol.5. 



>Serizawa is a good character in this manga. Though,
>the BEST Serizawa so far is still that Serizawa from
>"Shinsetsu Shinsengumi", IMHO ^^;;; Mechakucha kakkoii
>desu.

Serizawa of that Manga is "Kakkoyosugi". 
Owing to it, Hijikata is not conspicuous ^^;;; 

Soreha sorede omoshiroi desuga....




>I haven't checked this week's YS yet. I have seen only
>that it was the beginning of the Ikedaya incident.
>These days I was too busy checking Pluto, so... ^^;;;
>btw, Pluto is a HIGHLY recommended manga, though it
>has NOTHING to do with the Shinsengumi ^^;;; It's
>about Astro Boy ^^;; Urasawa Naoki rules *_*

Although I read "MASTER KEATON" and "Monster", "Pluto" is not 
reading. 
Since my younger sister likes the works of Urasawa, I borrow it from 
her. 



Tokorode Yamato wa gaikoku dewa donoyouni setsumei sareteiru no
desyouka?
Tashika Anime no ichiban saisyo no bamen wa WW2 de senkan-Yamato no
syukkou wo syounen ga miokurunodesuga arewa gaikoku demo cut sarezuni
mirukoto ga dekiru no desyouka?
(Totemo kini narimasu.)

momoiro-usagi
